name: clerk-prisma-starter
description: Official example use case for how you setup Prisma with Clerk.dev to achieve authenticated user access for your data.

CLERK_FRONTEND_API.description: The hostname of Clerk Frontend API used for authentication.

CLERK_API_KEY.description: The secret key for accessing the Clerk Backend API.

DATABASE_URL.description: Set this to the database URL, prisma needs to operate on.
